verses.verse: Now a <S%H376>man<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3947>married<s%> a <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son;<s%> and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he was <S%H2896>beautiful,<s%> she <S%H6845>hid<s%> him for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3391>months.<s%>

But when she <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H6845>hide<s%> him <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer,<s%> she <S%H3947>got<s%> him a <S%H1573>wicker<s%> <S%H8392>basket<s%> and <S%H9146>covered<s%> it over with <S%H2564>tar<s%> and <S%H2203>pitch.<s%> Then she <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%> into it, and <S%H7760>set<s%> [it] among the <S%H5488>reeds<s%> by the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H2975>Nile.<s%>
And his <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H3320>stood<s%> at a <S%H7350>distance<s%> to <S%H3045>find<s%> out <S%H4100>what<s%> would <S%H6213>happen<s%> to him.

Then the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7364>bathe<s%> at the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> with her <S%H5291>maidens<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> <S%H5921>alongside<s%> <S%H3027><s%> the <S%H2975>Nile;<s%> and she <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H8392>basket<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5488>reeds<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> her <S%H519>maid,<s%> and she <S%H3947>brought<s%> it [to her.]

When she <S%H6605>opened<s%> [it,] she <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> [the] <S%H5288>boy<s%> was <S%H1058>crying.<s%> And she <S%H2550>had<s%> <S%H2550>pity<s%> on him and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is <S%H4480>one<s%> of the Hebrews' <S%H3206>children.<s%>"

Then his <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to Pharaoh's <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> "Shall I <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H7121>call<s%> a <S%H3243>nurse<s%> for you from the <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5680>women,<s%> that she may <S%H3243>nurse<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%> for you?"
And Pharaoh's <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H1980>"Go<s%> [ahead]." So the <S%H5959>girl<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the child's <S%H517>mother.<s%>

Then Pharaoh's <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H1980>"Take<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3206>child<s%> away and <S%H3243>nurse<s%> him for me and I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> [you] your <S%H7939>wages.<s%>" So the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%> and <S%H5134>nursed<s%> him.

And the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H1431>grew,<s%> and she <S%H935>brought<s%> him to Pharaoh's <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and he <S%H1961>became<s%> her <S%H1121>son.<s%> And she <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>"Because<s%> I <S%H4871>drew<s%> him out of the <S%H4325>water.<s%>"

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H1431>grown<s%> up, that he <S%H3318>went<s%> out to his <S%H251>brethren<s%> and <S%H7200>looked<s%> on their <S%H5450>hard<s%> <S%H5450>labors;<s%> and he <S%H7200>saw<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> <S%H5221>beating<s%> a <S%H5680>Hebrew,<s%> <S%H4480>one<s%> of his <S%H251>brethren.<s%>

So he <S%H6437>looked<s%> <S%H3541>this<s%> <S%H3541>way<s%> and that, and when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> [around,] he <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> and <S%H2934>hid<s%> him in the <S%H2344>sand.<s%>

And he <S%H3318>went<s%> out the <S%H8145>next<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> were <S%H5327>fighting<s%> with each other; and he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H7563>offender,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> are you <S%H5221>striking<s%> your <S%H7453>companion<s%>?"

But he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> you a <S%H8269>prince<s%> or a <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us? Are you <S%H559>intending<s%> to <S%H2026>kill<s%> me, as you <S%H2026>killed<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>?" Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H403>"Surely<s%> the <S%H1697>matter<s%> has become <S%H3045>known.<s%>"

When <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>matter,<s%> he <S%H1245>tried<s%> to <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H3427>settled<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian;<s%> and he <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H3427>down<s%> by a <S%H875>well.<s%>

Now the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> had <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1802>draw<s%> <S%H1802>water,<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H7298>troughs<s%> to <S%H8248>water<s%> their father's <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

Then the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1644>drove<s%> them <S%H1644>away,<s%> but <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6965>stood<s%> up and <S%H3467>helped<s%> them, and <S%H8248>watered<s%> their <S%H6629>flock.<s%>
When they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7467>Reuel<s%> their father, he <S%H1>said,<s%> <S%H559>"Why<s%> have you <S%H4069>come<s%> [back] so <S%H935>soon<s%> <S%H4116>today<s%>?"

So they <S%H559>said,<s%> "An <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> us from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds;<s%> and <S%H1571>what<s%> is <S%H1571>more,<s%> he <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H1802>drew<s%> the <S%H1802>water<s%> for us and <S%H8248>watered<s%> the <S%H6629>flock.<s%>"

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H335>"Where<s%> is he then? <S%H4100>Why<s%> is it that you have <S%H5800>left<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5800>behind<s%>? <S%H7121>Invite<s%> him to have <S%H3899>something<s%> to <S%H398>eat.<s%>"
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H2974>willing<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with the <S%H376>man,<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H6855>Zipporah<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Then she <S%H3205>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and he <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H1647>Gershom,<s%> for he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H1961>been<s%> a <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> in a <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>"

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in [the course of] <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4191>died.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H584>sighed<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of the <S%H5656>bondage,<s%> and they <S%H2199>cried<s%> out; and their <S%H7775>cry<s%> for <S%H7775>help<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of [their] <S%H5656>bondage<s%> <S%H5927>rose<s%> up to <S%H430>God.<s%>

So <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H5009>groaning;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> His <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3045>took<s%> <S%H3045>notice<s%> [of them.]
